scriptmodule.description: The new Features here are Validations and verifications of Items in the Website, which is not directly related to the Checkout Prozess .

command.name: assertText
command.value: Sie können auch ohne ein HUGO BOSS Kundenkonto bestellen.

command.name: assertText
command.value: Im Anschluss an Ihre Bestellung haben Sie die Möglichkeit, ein Kundenkonto anzulegen.

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > span:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > span:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > span:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > span:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertVisible
command.target: css= div.cms-footer__item:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(1)

command.name: assertText
command.value: Bitte beachten Sie, dass sich Ihre Rechnungs- und Lieferanschrift in der Bundesrepublik Deutschland befinden muss. Eine Lieferung auf die Insel Helgoland und in die Gemeinde Büsingen am Hochrhein ist leider ausgeschlossen.
